name: vega-encode
description: Visual encoding transforms for Vega dataflows.

scripts.build: npm run test && uglifyjs build/vega-encode.js -c -m -o build/vega-encode.min.js
scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -g d3-array:d3,d3-format:d3,d3-interpolate:d3,vega-dataflow:vega,vega-scale:vega,vega-util:vega -f umd -n vega.transforms -o build/vega-encode.js -- index.js
scripts.postpublish: git push && git push --tags && zip -j build/vega-encode.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/vega-encode.js build/vega-encode.min.js
